description_long: You can use it as a flowchart maker, network diagram software, to create UML online, as an ER diagram tool, to design database schema, to build BPMN online, as a circuit diagram maker, and more. diagrams.net can import .vsdx, Gliffy™ and Lucidchart™ files.
hint: Diagrams cannot be stored on Portal, only on your local drive.
